com.pi4j.io.i2c

Interface I2CBus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    I2CBusImpl

    public interface I2CBus
    This is abstraction of i2c bus. This interface allows bus to return i2c device.
    Author:
    Daniel Sendula

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BUS_0 
      static int BUS_1 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this bus.
      I2CDevice getDevice(int address)
      Returns i2c device.

    • Method Detail

      • getDevice

        I2CDevice getDevice(int address)
             throws IOException
        Returns i2c device.
        Parameters:
        address - i2c device's address
        Returns:
        i2c device
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case this bus cannot return i2c device.

      • close

        void close()
    throws IOException
        Closes this bus. This usually means closing underlying file.
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case there are problems closing this i2c bus.
